Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the 26th Filmfare Awards?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award.
B. b) Laxmikant-Pyarelal won the Best Music Director award.
C. c) The awards were held in 2014.
D. d) Both a and b are correct.
Correct Answer: d) Both a and b are correct.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding *Satyam Shivam Sundaram* and its accolades?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
B. b) Radhu Karmakar was nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
C. c) The 26th Filmfare Awards recognized several outstanding performances.
D. d) Zeenat Aman was the only actress nominated for the Best Actress award.
Correct Answer: a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards. and b) Radhu Karmakar was nominated for Best Cinematography at the 26th Filmfare Awards.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the 26th Filmfare Awards and *Satyam Shivam Sundaram*?
Options:
A. a) Zeenat Aman won the Best Actress award at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
B. b) Raj Kapoor was nominated for Best Director at the 26th Filmfare Awards.
C. c) The movie was released in 2014.
D. d) Both a and b are correct.
Correct Answer: d) Both a and b are correct.
